p: Scott Zamvil: Dr. Zamvil is Deputy Editor of Neurology, Neuroimmunology and Neuroinflammation and is an Associate Editor for Frontiers in Immunology and Frontiers in Neurology. He serves on the Advisory Committee for the American Congress on Treatment and Research in Multiple Sclerosis (ACTRIMS) and is a standing member of the research grant review committee for the National Multiple Sclerosis Society (NMSS). He has served on the Editorial Board of the Journal of Clinical Investigation, The Journal of Immunology and The Journal of Neurological Sciences, and has been a charter member of the grant review committee for the National Institutes of Health (NIH) Clinical Neuroimmunology and Brain Tumors (CNBT).
